name: Mona
title: Astral Reflection
description: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title. Erudite, but prideful.

normal.1: Performs up to 4 water splash attacks that deal <hydro>Hydro DMG</hydro>.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal <hydro>AoE Hydro DMG</hydro> after a short casting time.

plunging.1: Gathering the might of Hydro, Mona plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <hydro>AoE Hydro DMG</hydro> upon impact with the ground.

description.0: Creates an illusory Phantom of Fate from coalesced waterspouts.
4: Continuously taunts nearby opponents, attracting their fire.
Continuously deals <hydro>Hydro DMG</hydro> to nearby opponents.
When its duration expires, the Phantom explodes, dealing <hydro>AoE Hydro DMG</hydro>.
description.7: Utilizes water currents to move backwards swiftly before conjuring a Phantom.
description.9: Only one Phantom created by Mirror Reflection of Doom can exist at any time.
description.11: Skilled astrologers have always dreamed of using a phantom facsimile of themselves to ward off imminent ill fate, but Mona must be the first to make such a mockery of it in all of Teyvat.

description.0: Mona summons the sparkling waves and creates a reflection of the starry sky, applying the Illusory Bubble status to opponents in a large AoE.
description.3: Traps opponents inside a pocket of destiny and also makes them <hydro>Wet</hydro>. Renders weaker opponents immobile.
description.4: When an opponent affected by Illusory Bubble sustains DMG, it has the following effects:
5: Applies an Omen to the opponent, which gives a DMG Bonus, also increasing the DMG of the attack that causes it.
Removes the Illusory Bubble, dealing <hydro>Hydro</hydro> DMG in the process.
description.8: During its duration, increases DMG taken by opponents.
description.10: It was from the time that gods first traced the lights in the heavens with their eyes that the notion of "fate" was born.

description.1: Mona cloaks herself within the water's flow, consuming Stamina to move rapidly.
description.3: When under the effect of Illusory Torrent, Mona can move at high speed on water.
description.4: Applies the <hydro>Wet</hydro> status to nearby opponents when she reappears.
description.6: This is something that Mona can do, but her teacher cannot. Well, but it's not as if her teacher would pursue any matter concerning Hydro Visions anyway...

description.0: After she has used Illusory Torrent for 2s, if there are any opponents nearby, Mona will automatically create a Phantom.
description.1: A Phantom created in this manner lasts for 2s, and its explosion DMG is equal to 50% of Mirror Reflection of Doom.

description.0: Increases Mona's <hydro>Hydro DMG Bonus</hydro> by a degree equivalent to 20% of her Energy Recharge rate.
When Mona crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, she has a 25% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.
When any of your own party members hits an opponent affected by an Omen, the effects of <hydro>Hydro-related Elemental Reactions</hydro> are enhanced for 8s:
When a Normal Attack hits, there is a 20% chance that it will be automatically followed by a Charged Attack.
description.1: This effect can only occur once every 5s.

description.0: Increases the Level of Stellaris Phantasm by 3.
When any party member attacks an opponent affected by an Omen, their CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.
Increases the Level of Mirror Reflection of Doom by 3.
Upon entering Illusory Torrent, Mona gains a 60% increase to the DMG of her next Charged Attack per second of movement.
description.1: A maximum DMG Bonus of 180% can be achieved in this manner. The effect lasts for no more than 8s.
